DOC.brief_summary: purpose study determine whether calcium supplementation effective prevent preeclampsia Sichuang Province china dose suitable
DOC.brief_title: Calcium Supplementation Prevent Preeclampsia Sichuan Province China
DOC.criteria: Nulliparity ; age ≥35 year ; Previous preeclampsia ; Family history preeclampsia ; Multiple pregnancy ; Time pregnancies ≥10years ; Body mass index ≥25 ; diastolic pressure ≥ 80 mm Hg 20 week ' gestation ; Proteinuria ≥+ one occasion ≥ 300 mg/24 h 20 week ' gestation ; Underlying medical condition ( Preexisting hypertension ; Preexisting renal disease ; Preexisting diabetes ; Presence antiphospholipid antibody ; Chronic autoimmune disease ) ; male sex partner 's predecessor wife Previous preeclampsia first prenatal visit 16 week ' gestation ; severe anemia ; Underlying medical condition need treatment first ( uncontrolled hyperthyreosis )
